name: Room 3020
description:
Room 3020 is a 3D horror game: try to escape  the labyrinth but it is always looking for you. Untill you are into yout Room (N° 3020) you should be safe, but...

Commands: 
WASDMoveControlCrouchEInteractQDrop Item1-2-3Change Item SlotMiddle Wheel UpChange Item Slot + 1Middle Wheel DownChange Item Slot - 1FTurn ON/OFF  FlashlightEscLock/Unlock Mouse
